item.description:
What do you get when you combine professional Ribbers from throughout the Northeast, live music, entertainment, childrenâ€™s activities, hot air balloon rides and much more at the Anheuser-Busch Facility in Merrimack, NH?

The Rotary Nashua West's 8th Annual Rock'N Ribfest!

And, even better, the live music on Saturday will include music from The James Montgomery Blues Band!

Tickets are only $5, but pets, outside food or drink, bags, coolers, and backpacks not allowed.

Given the distance, if you are interested in carpooling or ride share, please make sure to indicate that in your RSVP. If enough people are going, we can plan on meeting at a central location and heading out from there.

NOTE: NEW TIME
Due to a 60% chance of showers predicted for the later part of the afternoon, I have pushed up the start time for this event. However, the actual festival runs 11 AM to 11 PM, so feel free to go as early or late as you like.
item.name: Rock'N Ribfest!
